description.brief: The Open Source Computer Vision Library (latest)

package.description: This package contains the latest code from the Open Source Computer Vision Library (opencv). This ROS package does not modify OpenCV in any way; it simply provides a convenient way to download and compile the library in a way that can be managed by the ROS dependency system.
package.author: Gary Bradski and many others. See web page for a full contributor list. ROS package maintained by JD Chen.
